âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Self-hosted web archiving â€¢ Supports multiple input sources (URLs, bookmarks, Pocket, Pinboard, browser history) â€¢ Saves content in various formats (HTML, JS, PDFs, media, WARC, SQLite, JSON) â€¢ Provides CLI, REST API, and webhooks for integrations
ðŸ“– Summary: ArchiveBox is an open-source, self-hosted web archiving solution that captures and preserves digital content from various sources. It saves web pages, media, and other online data in durable, readable formats, making it accessible for long-term storage and future use.
